activities:
Qlik receives and process personal information that it receives from the EU for Human Resources activities as permissible under applicable law, in order to maintain records of current, former and prospective employees and to manage and maintain its employee workforce. 

Qlik from time to time may also receive and process personal information to enable us to develop, market, sell and deliver our products (software) and related services to prospective and current customers.
address: 150 N. Radnor Chester Rd., Suite E220
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human resources data, contact data relating to prospective and current customers.
recoursemech: EU, EEA and Swiss data protection authorities.
